title: Magic by @coldplay | Cover by Magaziine ft. Anilee List, Erin Bentlage, and Julia Gartha
description:
The impeccable vocal harmonies of Anilee, Erin, and Julia are true Magic in this Magaziine Cover of a great Coldplay song. This arrangement was made by the vocalists and they executed it flawlessly! I’m so blown away by how full of a sound is coming from just 3 voices! 

Save this song on Spotify: https://spoti.fi/3Th94Ql
Follow us on instagram: https://instagram.com/pomplamoosemusic
Become a patron of our music (to vote on the songs we cover and get merch and stuff like that): http://www.patreon.com/pomplamoose

A cover of Coldplay’s “Magic” by Magaziine, Anilee List, Erin Bentlage, and Julia Gartha

MUSICIAN CREDITS
Vocals/Arrangement: Erin Bentlage, Anilee List & Julia Gartha
Synth: Jack Conte, Will Gramling, Swatkins
Trigger Pads: Roberto Cerletti

AUDIO CREDITS
Engineer: Bill Mims
Assistant Engineer: Jack Corbett
Mixing/Mastering: Caleb Parker
Producer: Ben Rose

VIDEO CREDITS
Director: Dom Fera
Assistant Director: Michael Kiaunis
DP: Austin Hughes
Camera Operators: Ryan Blewett, Nate Cuboi, James Hull
Gaffer: Nash White
Key Grip: Brandon Garman
Set Dresser: Emma Bradford
Video Editor/Colorist: Hannah Moroz

Recorded at Stay Lucky Studios in Los Angeles.

#magaziine #coldplay #pomplamoose #erinbentlage #anileelist #juliagartha
